settings.question: What is Shopify?
settings.answers: Shopify is a complete ecommerce solution that allows you to set up an online store to sell your goods. Shopify is the leading ecommerce platform which enables entrepreneurs to start their own online store. It’s perfect for entrepreneurs who want to start their own ecommerce store without any hassle.

settings.verify_text: All products listed with Confidential Couture are guaranteed authentic. The process of authentication is rigorous guided by industry standards in order to provide enhanced capabilities to certify product authenticity.

Experts at CC have a depth of knowledge of the market, craftsmanship and material to realize the formula behind a Genuine product with expertise of 8 years and a highly qualified tetwork of individual ond commercial authenticators CC is proud of its authentication system developed over a period of time and. has a zero tolerance counterfeit policy in place
With every order an authenticity certificate is issued backed up with lifetime money back guarantee, so you could make purchases with confidence
Our dedicated team is available for your service vie call, email, whatsapp.

Item appears completely unused. May contain very faint signs of wear due to time & storage. Example: An purchase by the seller that has only made its appearance in his/her wardrobe.

Item contains extremely little wear. Any flaws or signs of wear are not visible to the naked eye and are described in the listing. Example: A bag worn by the seller for say, one event after which it made its way to us.

Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to

Item does show moderate signs of prior use. Surface scratches, slight darkening in handles, imperfections in metallic hardware and other indications of wear may be visible. Such signs of wear or imperfections will be noted in the listing. Example: A bag that was worn 2-3 times a week for a few months

Item will have noticeable signs of wear such as well scuffed edges or significant scratches. Please read the condition notes in the listing and inspect photos before purchasing. Fair condition items often present our customers with the greatest opportunity to save significantly on authentic luxury bags
